ai-patthana16.81:0.2_0: Having given the immaculateness of the Dhamma
ai-patthana16.81:0.3_0: Since they look forward to enjoying the power of development, they must be practiced for the sake of unworthy branches of knowledge.
ai-patthana16.81:1.1_0: One thing should not be given up by means of the path and for the sake of development, because of the path leading to the end of the development of no further development of it.
ai-patthana16.81:2.1_0: One doesn’t give up uncertainty regarding the development of the path, nor give rise to the root of repulsion.
ai-patthana16.81:2.1_2: There are three more mendicants who have no regrets.
